testcase.name: Appinfo
testcase.description:
Section 3.4 ''XBRL instances, XBRL linkbases and XBRL taxonomy schemas MUST comply with the syntax requirements imposed in this specification. Many of these syntax requirements are expressed using XML Schemas so a part of the validation process can be performed using XML Schema validation software.''
Since annotation/appinfo stipulates lax validation, any processor that chooses to satisfy section 3.4 by employing a validating XML parser (such as Xerces) has a responsibility to ensure that the appropriate declarations for XBRL components are provided to that parser.
